IsCameraView.description: Whether the positioning of this object is used as camera position(?)

Distance.description: The distance this camera stays away from the player.

GravityOffset.description: How much to offset this camera's position in the direction of the player's gravity?

PlayerOffset.description: How much to offset this camera's position from the player's position.

Extra.value: A camera which will only follow the player vertically (X and Z movement will be ignored).
